project.name: Lisp
project.description: The Gentoo Lisp Project handles Lisp related packages in the Gentoo package tree.
project.longdescription: The Gentoo Lisp Project handles Lisp related packages in the Gentoo package tree. This includes Common Lisp and Scheme implementations, applications and libraries. The project will also maintain Lisp unrelated ebuilds assigned to one of its herds.
